text: Radim Drejsl (29 April 1923 â€“ 20 April 1953) was a Czech composer, pianist and conductor. He is considered an important composer of politically engaged songs promoting visions of Czechoslovak communist regime in the 1950s. Drejsl applied the ideas of socialist realism in his music. == References == Category:1923 births Category:1953 deaths Category:Czech composers
title: Radim Drejsl
